fields.description:
The Facebook libs once again need to be updated, especially on iOS to support iOS 13+.

https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook/pull/103
fields.summary: TiAPI: Update Facebook SDK's to latest (iOS 5.4.1, Android 5.4.0) to support iOS 13

comments.body:
Verified the fix on sdk 8.2.0.v20190917100859. facebook module updated and works as expected.
